verses.verse: But there shall be no more gloom <WH4155> for her who was in anguish. <WH4164> In <WH6256> the former time, <WH7223> he brought into contempt <WH7043> the land <WH776> of Zebulun <WH2074> and the land <WH776> of Naphtali; <WH5321> but in the latter <WH314> time he has made it glorious, <WH3513> by the way <WH1870> of the sea, <WH3220> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan, <WH3383> Galilee <WH1551> of the nations. <WH1471>

The people <WH5971> who walked <WH1980> in darkness <WH2822> have seen <WH7200> a great <WH1419> light. <WH216> Those who lived <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the shadow of death, <WH6757> on them the light <WH216> has shined. <WH5050>

You have multiplied <WH7235> the nation. <WH1471> You have increased <WH1431> their joy. <WH8057> They rejoice <WH8057> before <WH6440> you according to the joy <WH8057> in harvest, <WH7105> as men rejoice <WH1523> when they divide <WH2505> the spoil. <WH7998>

For the yoke <WH5923> of his burden, <WH5448> and the staff <WH4294> of his shoulder, <WH7926> the rod <WH7626> of his oppressor, <WH5065> you have broken <WH2865> as in the day <WH3117> of Midian. <WH4080>

For all the armor <WH5430> of the armed man <WH5431> in the noisy <WH7494> battle, <WH8071> and the garments rolled <WH1556> in blood, <WH1818> will be for burning, <WH8316> fuel <WH3980> for the fire. <WH784>

For to us a child <WH3206> is born. <WH3205> To us a son <WH1121> is given; <WH5414> and the government <WH4951> will be on his shoulders. <WH7926> His name <WH8034> will be called <WH7121> Wonderful, <WH6382> Counselor, <WH3289> Mighty <WH1368> God, <WH410> Everlasting <WH5703> Father, <WH1> Prince <WH8269> of Peace. <WH7965>

Of the increase <WH4766> of his government <WH4951> and of peace <WH7965> there shall be no end, <WH7093> on the throne <WH3678> of David, <WH1732> and on his kingdom, <WH4467> to establish <WH3559> it, <WH4941> and to uphold it with justice <WH4941> and with righteousness <WH6666> from that time on, <WH5704> even forever. <WH5769> The zeal <WH7068> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> will perform this. <WH6213>
The Lord <WH136> sent <WH7971> a word <WH1697> into Jacob, <WH3290> and it falls <WH5307> on Israel. <WH3478>
All the people <WH5971> will know, <WH3045> including Ephraim <WH669> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Samaria, <WH8111> who say <WH559> in pride <WH1346> and in arrogance <WH1346> of heart, <WH3824>

"The bricks <WH3843> have fallen, <WH5307> but we will build <WH1129> with cut stone. <WH1496> The sycamore <WH8256> fig trees have been cut down, <WH1438> but we will put cedars <WH730> in their place. <WH2498>"
Therefore Yahweh <WH3068> will set up <WH7682> on high against him the adversaries <WH6862> of Rezin, <WH7526> and will stir <WH5526> up <WH5526> his enemies, <WH341>

The Syrians <WH758> in front, <WH6924> and the Philistines <WH6430> behind; <WH268> and they will devour <WH398> Israel <WH3478> with open mouth. <WH6310> For all this, <WH639> his anger is not turned away, <WH7725> but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out still. <WH5186>
Yet the people <WH5971> have not turned <WH7725> to him who struck <WH5221> them, <WH1875> neither have they sought Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies. <WH6635>
Therefore Yahweh <WH3068> will cut off <WH3772> from Israel <WH3478> head <WH7218> and tail, <WH2180> palm branch <WH3712> and reed, <WH100> in one <WH259> day. <WH3117>
The elder <WH2205> and the honorable <WH6440> man <WH1931> is the head, <WH7218> and the prophet <WH5030> who teaches <WH3384> lies <WH8267> is the tail. <WH2180>
For those who lead <WH833> this people <WH5971> lead them astray; <WH8582> and those who are led <WH833> by them are destroyed. <WH1104>

Therefore the Lord <WH136> will not rejoice <WH8055> over their young men, <WH970> neither will he have compassion <WH7355> on their fatherless <WH3490> and widows; <WH490> for everyone is profane <WH2611> and an evildoer, <WH7489> and every mouth <WH6310> speaks <WH1696> folly. <WH5039> For all this his anger <WH639> is not turned away, <WH7725> but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out still. <WH5186>

For wickedness <WH7564> burns <WH1197> like a fire. <WH784> It devours <WH398> the briers <WH8068> and thorns; <WH7898> yes, <WH3341> it kindles in the thickets <WH5442> of the forest, <WH3293> and they roll upward <WH55> in a column <WH1348> of smoke. <WH6227>

Through the wrath <WH5678> of Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies, <WH6635> the land <WH776> is burnt <WH6272> up; <WH5971> and the people are the fuel <WH3980> for the fire. <WH784> No one <WH376> spares <WH2550> his brother. <WH251>

One will devour <WH1504> on the right hand, <WH3225> and be hungry; <WH7457> and he will eat <WH398> on the left hand, <WH8040> and they will not be satisfied. <WH7646> Everyone <WH376> will eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of his own arm: <WH2220>

Manasseh, <WH4519> Ephraim; <WH669> and Ephraim, <WH669> Manasseh; <WH4519> and they together <WH3162> shall be against Judah. <WH3063> For all this his anger <WH639> is not turned away, <WH7725> but his hand <WH3027> is stretched out still. <WH5186>
